Class VectorSpace3D

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.mathematics.linearalgebra.spaces.VectorSpace3D
All Implemented Interfaces:
AbelianGroup<Vector<Real>>, AbelianMonoid<Vector<Real>>, Group<Vector<Real>>, Magma<Vector<Real>>, Monoid<Vector<Real>>, Set<Vector<Real>>, Module<Vector<Real>, Real>, VectorSpace<Vector<Real>, Real>
public class VectorSpace3D extends Object implements VectorSpace<Vector<Real>, Real>
3D Vector Space.

Optimized for 3D geometry and physics.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
